it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CouncilAction, MarketAction, TakeCardAction, YieldAndProductAction

    public abstract class Action
extends java.util.Observable
    Class for basic action, requires the implementation of checkAction, doAction, createRequest
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

      • discount

      • actionValue

        protected int actionValue
        actionValue is the current value of the action. We have two possibilities for the action: a "normal" action, in which the player move the familiar in one position and a "bonus" action, in which the player select only a position, without positioning any familiar. In this last case, we have an action value, taken from the card, and we haven't a value taken from the familiar. So we need a variable to have the correct value, to do some control, to rise a bonus action and so on... Then we decide to use this variable also for the "normal" action with familiar, and we set it while the action is constructed The increment the player wants to do is in familiar.getIncrement, the others kinds of increments are stored in actionValue

      • Action

        public Action(ActionType type,
              Familiar familiar)
        Constructor for normal action, player is get from familiar
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the action
        familiar - The familiar the player wants to move

      • Action

        public Action(ActionType type,
              Player player,
              int actionValue,
              int actionIncrement)
        Constructor for bonus action (no familiar involved, so requires the player)
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the bonus action
        player - The interested player
        actionValue - The value of the bonus action
        actionIncrement - The increment the player wants

    • Method Detail

      • paySlave

        public void paySlave()
              throws NotEnoughResourcesException
        Private method used to pay slaves to increase an action
        Parameters:
        slaveToPay - The number of slave the player wants to use
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException - Thrown if the player hasn't enough resources

      • rollBackAction

        public void rollBackAction()
        Method used to roll back an action when there is a problem with an Action, such as the player can't play or the player can't afford a card cost

      • removeIncrement

        public void removeIncrement()
        Method used to remove the familiar increment when there is a problem with this action, in other words when the action response is FAILURE or CANNOT_PLAY

      • checkAction

        public abstract Response checkAction()
        Does all the required checks before the action is applicated
        Returns:
        A response which represents the Success/Failure of the method: SUCCESS for a successful control, FAILURE for a generic problem, LOW_LEVEL if the player hasn't enough resources, CANNOT_PLAY if the player can not play this action

      • doAction

        public abstract void doAction()
                       throws FamiliarInWrongPosition
        Throws:
        FamiliarInWrongPosition

        public boolean playerHasCouncilRequests()
        Control if player has some council requests
        Returns:
        True if the player has some council requests to satisy, otherwise False

        protected Response checkBanInPlayer()

        Returns:

      • isBonusAction

        public boolean isBonusAction()
        Method used to know if the action is really a bonus action. If the player is doing a bonus action, he doesn't use a player
        Returns:
        True if the familiar is null, otherwise False
